info.name: Mental Health App API
info.description: Complete API collection for Mental Health Application Backend

formdata.value: Licensed therapist with 10 years of experience

request.description: Get a list of therapists from past bookings for the authenticated patient. Returns unique therapists with their last session information and total session count.

item.name: Get Past Therapists by Patient ID (Admin)

request.description: Get past therapists for a specific patient. Admin only. Returns unique therapists with their last session information and total session count.

query.description: Optional: Filter by status (pending, confirmed, completed, cancelled, no-show, rescheduled)

request.description: Get bookings for a therapist grouped by date with booking counts. Returns how many slots are booked for each date. By default, only counts active bookings (excludes cancelled and no-show).
Update booking details. Valid statuses: pending, confirmed, completed, cancelled, no-show, rescheduled. If status is set to cancelled, cancelledBy will be automatically set based on the user role.

Reschedule a booking. Only the patient who made the booking can reschedule it. Duration is optional and defaults to the current booking duration. IMPORTANT: Rescheduling is only allowed if the booking is at least 24 hours away. Bookings less than 24 hours away cannot be rescheduled.
Cancel a booking. Can be cancelled by the patient, therapist, or admin. The cancelledBy field will be automatically set based on who cancels it.

formdata.value: Excellent therapist, very helpful and understanding.

formdata.description: Required: User ID (automatically set from auth token if authenticated)
Options: billing_refunds, technical_support, session_support, account_issues, platform_features, therapist_concerns, general_inquiry

formdata.value: I'm having trouble booking a session with my therapist.

request.description: Create a new support ticket. userId is required (automatically extracted from auth token if authenticated, or can be provided in body). ticketNumber is auto-generated in format: TKT-YYYYMMDD-XXXXXX

query.description: Search in subject, description, email, or ticketNumber
Filter by userType: patient or therapist
Filter by status: open, in_progress, resolved, closed
Filter by priority: low, medium, high

request.description: Get all support tickets with filtering and pagination. Search includes subject, description, email, and ticketNumber.
Get a support ticket by MongoDB ID

item.name: Get Support Ticket By Ticket Number

request.description: Get a support ticket by ticket number. Useful for customer-facing lookups. Ticket number format: TKT-YYYYMMDD-XXXXXX

body.raw:
{
  "name": "John Doe",
  "email": "john.doe@example.com",
  "phone": "+1234567890",
  "message": "I would like to know more about your services.",
  "subject": "General Inquiry"
}
